full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 137 of 236 LC3KMAX4 Parkinson - Direct please play Government Exhibit 296, and I'll ask you to play it for 30 seconds and then pause. Q. Pausing at 30 seconds, Mr. Parkinson, what part of the search are we seeing on this video? A. This is the -- our ground floor, coming from the south to the north, and going through the central lobby area to where the stairwell is leading to the second floor. Q. What was happening at this point in the video? A. This was the initial search for any other persons that may have been in the residence, officer safety. Q. Thank you. MR. EVERDELL: We can play it for another about eight seconds, Ms. Drescher. Pause it here, please, Ms. Drescher, at 37 seconds. Q. What is being shown here, Mr. Parkinson? A. This is the first and formal reading of the contents of the search warrant to the property manager. Q. Is that the property manager whose name you told us earlier? A. Yes. Mr. Janusz Banasiak. MS. COMEY: For the rest of this video, I think it might be useful to refer to what is in evidence as Government Exhibit 298, your Honor. With your permission, I'd ask that the jurors please be permitted to take out their binders and look at Government Exhibit 298. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012651
